name: 瓦莱卡·杰西卡
name_full: 瓦莱卡·杰西卡 Valeka Jessica

last_movies.title: 权欲第四章：武力 第二季

introduction: Affectionally known as V, Valeka emerges as a sophisticated, persevering and indisputable talented figure, sparking industry-wide excitement for quite some time.The vivacious actress is known for her brilliantly accurate spot-on Kim Wayans impersonations and sketch comedy, gaining millions of views within days of posting her videos.Valeka's dynamic and fearless portrayals of strong female lead characters truly embody excellence, solidifying her status as one of Hollywood's hottest stars proficient in both drama and comedy.In June 2023, Valeka marked her directorial debut with a production of 'In The Continuum' by Black Panther star Danai Gurira & Nikkole Salter at Synchronicity Theatre in Atlanta, GA. Brad Rudy of The Atlanta Theatre Buzz applauds Director Valeka Jessica, stating, "all choices serve to enhance the story and the characters - In the Continuum is a devastatingly moving and ultimately exhilarating experience that should not be missed."Beyond the screen, Valeka graces top stages worldwide, showcasing her theatrical prowess and touring her one-woman shows.With her divinely feminine presence, Valeka advocates for women Blossoming After Divorce, using her platform to share personal experiences and her journey to wellness post-divorce. Her self-help book, "Blossoming After Divorce: 11 Tips to Manifest the Goddess Within," is available for purchase on Amazon.
